@ s0mnambul1st

It's because you updated mkv2vob. You'll need to roll back the version 2.4.7. After you download that version disconnect from the internet and untick automatic update. 
 You can find it here : http://www.videohelp.com/tools/mkv2vob/o...s#download

Although some americans probably contribute to the site (thank you for that) its not all about you. I know, its an overwhelming concept, but with time you can get used to it.
